channel.title: Help with some prices and quests.. please read!
channel.description:
Rightt :D
On my server blood runes are 5k ea :O and im not sure how to change the price. If you know pls tell me what to put in what file please :D thanks.
Also people are moaning about they have to complete quests to hold items.. how do i make it so all the quests are complete?
And also how do i change my starter items..
Thankyou :) its up new today so ill be asking a few questions as im new to this.
Thanks, Jake :D

item.cfg for blood runes price change

client.java

search for Starter"

Then edit the things called

“addItem(blabal, bla);”
